content.question: The excerpt best reflects which of the following developments by the 1920s?

choices.label: The growing similarity of rural and urban African American culture
The decline in racial violence against African Americans
The rise of African American civil rights advocacy organizations in the North
The movement of African Americans during the Great Migration

content.answer: The movement of African Americans during the Great Migration

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
